text: Alejandro Javier García Padilla (born August 3, 1971) is a Puerto Rican politician. He was the Governor of Puerto Rico from 2013 to 2017. He was elected governor in January 2013. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Puerto Rico Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Puerto Rican lawyers
title: Alejandro García Padilla
